faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Bien-Rentré

emergency.question: Is Bien-Rentré an emergency alert system?
emergency.answer: No, Bien-Rentré is not an official emergency alert system. It is a prevention tool that allows you to share your position with trusted contacts for nighttime travel. In case of real emergency, immediately contact the appropriate emergency services (112, 911, etc.).

dataProtection.question: How is my location data protected?
dataProtection.answer: Your location data is only shared with contacts you have explicitly authorized. It is encrypted and temporarily stored during the active session. We fully comply with GDPR and our practices are detailed in our privacy policy.

offline.question: Does the app work offline?
offline.answer: Bien-Rentré requires an internet connection to share real-time geolocation. However, the app can detect connection loss and notify your contact in case of GPS signal interruption.

contacts.question: How many contacts can I add?
contacts.answer: In the free version, you can add up to 3 trusted contacts. The premium version allows unlimited simultaneous contacts.

accuracy.question: What is the geolocation accuracy?
accuracy.answer: The app uses your smartphone's built-in GPS with accuracy generally between 5 to 10 meters. Accuracy may vary depending on weather conditions and network coverage.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.meta: Terms of Use for the Bien-Rentré application - Security app for your late-night returns
terms.welcome: Welcome to Bien-Rentré, a mobile security app designed to accompany you during your nighttime travels. By using Bien-Rentré, you accept these terms of use. Please read them carefully.

1.title: Service Purpose
1.content: Bien-Rentré is a mobile app that allows users to share their real-time location with trusted contacts during nighttime travel. The app provides additional protection against risks related to evening journeys.
1.important: Important: Bien-Rentré is not an official emergency alert system. In case of real danger, immediately contact the appropriate emergency services (112, 911, etc.).

age.title: Minimum Age
age.content: Use of Bien-Rentré is reserved for persons aged 18 and over. Minors are not authorized to use the application.

responsible.title: Responsible Use
responsible.content: You agree to use Bien-Rentré responsibly and in accordance with its purpose. The app must exclusively serve personal security purposes during nighttime travel.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: Creating an account requires accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials.

location.title: Location Sharing
location.content: The app uses your mobile device's geolocation services. You fully control the activation and deactivation of your position sharing.

contacts.title: Trusted Contacts
contacts.content: You can designate a limited number of authorized contacts to track your route. These contacts must have given their prior consent.
